comments: Abolished 1.4.1934 and added to the parish of Kintbury.

On 28.3.1895 the part in BerkshireÂ  became 
    part of the parish of Hungerford, so that thereafter Chilton Foliat was 
    entirely 
    in Wiltshire. See also Table 2, note (a).

Transferred from Hampshire to the county of Berkshire on 30.9.1895. 
    See also Table 2, note (b).
Abolished 1894 and added to the parish of Tidcombe & Fosbury.

On 28.3.1895 the part in Wiltshire  was 
    transferred to Berkshire, so that thereafter Hungerford was entirely in Berkshire. See also Table 2, note (b).

On 30.9.1895 the part in Berkshire was 
    transferred  to Wiltshire, so that thereafter Shalbourne was entirely 
    in Wiltshire. See also Table 2, note (a).
